Description: Description New MARATHON ST211003 Stopwatch Single Action Mechanical Windup Analog Stop Watch by Marathon Product Description SINGLE ACTION MECHANICAL STOPWATCH 0 to 30 minutes (30 minute register) 1/5 second and 1/100 minute divisions start, stops, and returns to zero by consecutive crown depressions. Rugged 15 jewel lever movement. Anti-magnetic and shock protected. Case is nickel - chrome plated. This stop watch is great for industrial timing as the dial allows the user to record in 1/5 second intervals or 1/100 minute intervals. 30 minute register of 1 minute division value 1/5 second and 1/100 minute divisions (2 scales) Starts, stops, and returns to zero by consecutive crown depressions Rugged 15 jewel lever movement Anti-magnetic and shock protected Case is nickel - chrome plated Product Dimensions: 9 x 6.3 x 1.2 inches Shipping Weight: 2.4 ounces Item model number: ST211003 Product Features EASY TO USE One button function- starts, stops and returns to zero by consecutive crown depressions. JEWEL Rugged 15 jewel lever movement. DURABLE- Dust, water, shock and corrosion resistant. Anti-magnetic and shock protected Gift box included.
